body: Inspired by and built on #13720
If you mean our next supported minimum macOS version, shouldn't this be 10.10?
diff_hunk:
@@ -105,3 +110,34 @@ jobs:
               while read LINE; do travis_retry gpg --keyserver hkp://subset.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys $LINE; done < contrib/verify-commits/trusted-keys &&
               travis_wait 50 contrib/verify-commits/verify-commits.py;
           fi
+    - stage: lint BSD
+      os: osx
+      # Use macOS consistent with the minimum supported version: 10.11

body: Thanks - was relying on faulty memory. Also it happens to be the earliest version supported by Travis. Updated. #13617

body:
Concept ACK

Nit: macOS ships with GNU bash, albeit an ancient version. Please change "helps ensure ongoing compatibility with BSD bash as well as GNU bash" to something along the lines of "helps ensure ongoing compatibility with the macOS BSD user land and the ancient version of GNU bash shipped with macOS".

```
/usr/local/Homebrew/Library/Homebrew/brew.rb:12:in `<main>': Homebrew must be run under Ruby 2.3! You're running 2.0.0. (RuntimeError)
```
~wip: IÃ¢ÂÂm rolling back to 10.10~

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13816 (travis: WIP - build and run tests on os: osx by scravy)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Might as well do a full depends and bitcoind build when pulling in macos anyway?
AFAIK it is not required to enumerate `osx` here.
diff_hunk:
@@ -1,6 +1,8 @@
 sudo: required
 dist: trusty
-os: linux
+os:
+  - linux
+  - osx

body: you can use the same stage `lint` - it will have this stage with two jobs, one in linux, one in macOS

 stages:
   - lint
   - test
+  - lint macOS

body: ACK d5d76655105d6d338dbc367ae0b54b7433ffeb38

utACK d5d7665

Closing my PR #13720 in favour of this one.

There are some non-travis related changes here, which should be submitted independently, imo.

I.e. all commits to b24ee7680cd1b5932cd3092113bcef2fe2db5d19 might go to a separate pull.
@MarcoFalke FYI those changes are required to make the lint stage pass when also run on Mac, so I included them to make this PR green. Will extract a second PR for them in case that's helpful.

~On second thought I instead set up CI runs against this PR with each of the prior commits excluded, to demonstrate the associated failure:
sans 4874450 / empty subexpressions: https://travis-ci.org/Empact/bitcoin/builds/421218998
sans 28d520b / SC1087: https://travis-ci.org/Empact/bitcoin/builds/421219652
sans a442c33 / SC1117: https://travis-ci.org/Empact/bitcoin/jobs/421201432
sans 21ff32e / SC2206: https://travis-ci.org/Empact/bitcoin/builds/421219244
sans 2917ecd / SC2207: https://travis-ci.org/Empact/bitcoin/builds/421220532
sans f65efb2 / SC2230: https://travis-ci.org/Empact/bitcoin/builds/421219961~

Rebased for #14115. This now only adds the mac-based lint run to CI.

utACK 453daa0.
Maybe put it in test stage. It takes 3 minutes to boot and 4 minutes to run the script.

utACK 453daa0e24ae441175f413dd03460417eb4f4ee5

Will be great to have this in Travis!

nit: Remove Linux in PR title? :-)
Moved it into a 3rd/final "Compat" stage. Sound good?
It says `osx_image: xcode7.3` and at the same time `could not get this working with xcode7.3`
diff_hunk:
@@ -135,3 +135,24 @@ jobs:
         RUN_FUNCTIONAL_TESTS=false
         GOAL="all deploy"
         BITCOIN_CONFIG="--enable-gui --enable-reduce-exports --enable-werror"
+# OSX bash compatibility
+    - stage: compat
+      os: osx
+      # Use the earliest macOS that can build our lint dependencies:
+      # Xcode 7.3.1, macOS 10.11, JDK 1.8.0_92-b14
+      # Earlier versions failed to make and install ghc for shellcheck
+      # https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/reference/osx/#OS-X-Version
+      osx_image: xcode7.3
+      # TODO: if you're updating osx_image, try using rvm: to supply the version of ruby
+      # required by homebrew. Could not get this working with xcode7.3 but believe it should

body: That's correct - I could not get the `rvm: 2.3.7` setting working in the version used here, so had to use `brew update` in the install script. Updated the comment to clarify what "this" is.
diff_hunk:
@@ -135,3 +135,24 @@ jobs:
         RUN_FUNCTIONAL_TESTS=false
         GOAL="all deploy"
         BITCOIN_CONFIG="--enable-gui --enable-reduce-exports --enable-werror"
+# OSX bash compatibility
+    - stage: compat
+      os: osx
+      # Use the earliest macOS that can build our lint dependencies:
+      # Xcode 7.3.1, macOS 10.11, JDK 1.8.0_92-b14
+      # Earlier versions failed to make and install ghc for shellcheck
+      # https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/reference/osx/#OS-X-Version
+      osx_image: xcode7.3
+      # TODO: if you're updating osx_image, try using rvm: to supply the version of ruby
+      # required by homebrew. Could not get this working with xcode7.3 but believe it should
